jump in.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to interrupt someone or suddenly join a conversation
jump in.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Lena quickly jumped in with a diverting remark.
jump in.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to do something quickly, often without thinking about it carefully
jump in.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: He counseled caution to clients wanting to jump in and buy stocks.
